name: Starfend
description:
Place defenses strategically, upgrade and combine them. Starfend is a 3D tower defense game set in a vast space universe where you will take command of a powerful fleet of advanced spaceships. Your mission is to protect the orbit of inhabited planets against a relentless horde of malevolent meteors that threaten to destroy.
Get ready to face an endless succession of challenges, as the game has endless levels, each one more intense and exciting than the last. At each level, you'll be confronted with different models of meteors, each with a different type of protection to try to break through your defenses.

Your arsenal of space defenses includes 10 types of ships with 10 levels, each equipped with futuristic weapons and special abilities. Carefully plan your tactics, place ships in strategic locations around the meteor paths, upgrade your turrets and combine them to get strongger and meet the ever-increasing challenges the hostile universe presents.
In addition, the 3D gameplay brings an immersive and dynamic experience, allowing you to freely explore, rotate the view and get a complete perspective of space combat.

CameraControls: Hold mouse right click and drag to look around.
W - move forward, S - move backward, A - move left, D - move right, Q - move down, E - move up or Hold mouse left click and drag to move the camera. hold shift to increase camera speed.F - Change to free camera. R - reset free camera position. use arrows to switch beteween static cameras, use mouse scroll to zoom in and out.Use mouse left click for interactions.
